You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesL L] > &laquo

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&laquo;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ab/index.htm U+000AB].
  * `&laquo` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ab/index.htm U+000AB].
